video.title: The Protector
video.synopsis: Discovering his ties to a secret ancient order, a young man living in modern Istanbul embarks on a quest to save the city from an immortal enemy.

episodes.synopsis: While desperately seeking opportunities to fund his next business venture, Hakan comes across a talismanic shirt potentially worth a lot of money.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Hakan has a hard time believing the story of the Protector. Despite being told to stay put so the Immortal can't reach him, he sneaks out to find Memo.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: When Hakan and Zeynep arrive at the address to meet with the Loyal One protecting the ring, they find a decrepit house in the middle of nowhere.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Hakan's new job begins at a party celebrating Faysal Erdem's big win with the Hagia Sophia project. Meanwhile, Zeynep follows clues to find the stone.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: While Hakan visits the Princes' Islands to learn about his past, Zeynep and Kemal head to the Mausoleum of Mimar Sinan to look for the stone.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Hakan struggles to choose between his new love and his duties as the Protector. After sending Emir back home, Kemal heads out in search of the dagger.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: With no time to devise a better way to circumvent the museum's security system, Zeynep defers to Hakan's plan, which comes with risks.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Zeynep seeks Timur's help for her dad. Faysal Erdem disapproves of Mazhar's recent actions. Leyla feels conflicted about her relationship with Hakan.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: While being led away from the crime scene, Hakan spots something unexpected. To learn more about the Immortal, Kemal risks his status -- and much more.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Blinded by love, Hakan disregards his training and his duties as the Protector. Leyla informs him that an Immortal's blood contains a secret power.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Faysal publicly implicates Hakan in the Hagia Sophia incident. A grief-stricken Zeynep confronts Derya and learns about an imminent attack in the city.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Hakan finds a link between the museum robbery and the Immortals' lethal plan. Struggling under Faysal's influence, Leyla puts Hakan in danger.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Zeynep enlists Leyla's help in pinpointing the Immortals' target for the attack. Faysal goes after Hakan as Rüya's condition deteriorates.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Hakan and the Loyal Ones hatch a scheme against Faysal, who uses Leyla as a bargaining chip — but a shocking betrayal derails the plan.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: As Hakan scrambles to find Levent and put a stop to his vindictive crime spree, another Immortal takes control of Leyla's mind.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Tensions come to a head between Faysal and Rüya, who conspires with Mergen against Hakan. Leyla's fate hangs by a thread.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Rüya uses Levent as a pawn in her masterplan. Zeynep and Azra learn that the talismanic objects are losing their powers.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: The Oracle tells Zeynep and Hakan what it would take to restore the powers of the talismanic objects. Blood is shed on both sides in a vicious showdown.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Zeynep and Hakan race against time to find Nisan, a chemist who’s their only hope for a cure. A shadow from the past returns.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Vizier, the mysterious leader of the Immortals, curbs Rüya's ambitions and lures Hakan into a trap using Levent. Faysal makes a vindictive decision.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Hakan and the Loyal Ones hatch a scheme to gain Rüya's allegiance. Vizier demands Faysal's help in retrieving the last piece of the key.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: The Oracle shares an ominous vision, Hakan visits the past, and Zeynep overhears Vizier confronting Rüya about the key.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: A mysterious symbol offers Hakan a clue as he scrambles to uncover Vizier's identity, but his omnipresent foe stays a step ahead.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Nisan accompanies Hakan in his search for the key's missing piece. Vizier threatens to drive Hakan to the edge as a shocking truth comes to light.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Galvanized by a centuries-old betrayal, Vizier turns all of Istanbul against Hakan in a fateful coup de main.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Back in the past, Hakan steals an item from Vizier and encounters a familiar face. Zeynep sets out to prove her loyalty to the Immortals.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Amid a search for the potion in the past, Hakan overhears details of a fatal plot against Vizier. The Oracle reveals to Zeynep a cryptic prophecy.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: After deciphering Okhan's note, Hakan scrambles to foil a sinister scheme against the Sultan  — with unexpected consequences.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Faysal turns the tables on Vizier. Trapped in a precarious state, Hakan gains an unlikely ally. Zeynep acquires tremendous powers.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Zeynep shows Hakan a vision of the future — but she hides a crucial detail. Vizier confronts Okhan and Faysal in her search for the truth about Harun.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Hakan visits a healer with an unexpected link to Harun's past. Faysal sets his scheme in motion as Hakan's talismanic powers fade.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Hakan wakes up to a different reality. Zeynep and Hakan discover Faysal's shocking connection to the first Protector.
episodes.title: Episode 7
